Dear Milan Alumni,

The renovation of Johnnie Hale Stadium is progressing very well. Located within the new entrance there will be an area celebrating the historic success that has been experienced in Johnnie Hale Stadium. We are currently asking for cheerleading, band, and football items to fill the display area. If you have an old letterman jacket, cheerleader outfit, pom-pom, foam finger, tiny football, program, photo, or anything else that you feel would be a great addition to this area, please share a picture of the item online with us or you may message this account with your personal information. We hope the area will be rotating new items annually throughout the next 50 years in the stadium. We look forward to seeing everyone this fall under the Friday night lights as we cheer on the Bulldogs. GO DOGS!

The application deadline is Friday, May 1.

Our goal is to have online registration up and running mid-July. Be sure to check out our social media account, your local newspaper, and our website for future updates.

Thank you!
